game.name: Of Ash and Steel
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Of Ash and Steel은 고전 명작 RPG들의 본질과 현대 게임 디자인을 중시하는 열정적인 팀이 만들어낸 몰입형 3인칭 오픈 월드 RPG입니다. 한때 번영했던 섬을 탐험하며, 전투 기술을 가다듬고, 가혹한 일곱 왕국의 영토에서 살아남으세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Of Ash and Steel is an immersive third-person open-world RPG created by a passionate team that values the essence of classic old-school RPGs and modern design. Explore the lands of a once-prosperous island, hone your combat skills, and survive in the unforgiving realm of the Kingdom of the Seven.

reviewHighlights.text: As of 13/12/25 the game is currently very bugged and frequently breaks and make your saves unplayable and the developer has gone silent as it appears...
This game has potential but its nowhere near release ready, it should be listed as early access at best. Enemy scaling is painful, introductory quests...
